oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Site of the Sam Levy Homes, c.1950
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of a house on the site of the Sam Levy Homes (Project Tenn. 5-7), c.1950. Located at 303 Foster Street in East Nashville, the housing project was named in honor of Sam Levy, a member of the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
